Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Montgomery to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Montgomery to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes to November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization granted to the county of Montgomery to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
